name: Spirited Together👹
description:
Spirited Together

Spirited together is a strategic puzzle game about defeating restless spirits. When defeated they will help you. Each spirit is bound to a direction you can move in. So choose and tread carefully...

Made by:

Code and Design:
Midas "Zupami" Schonewille
Dwight "Dwightojo" Peters
AzureKai

Art, Music and Animation
Chrit "ChriticalHit" Hameleers
